Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that holding your breath for 10 seconds is not a way to test for COVID-19.
Understate: The claim understates the complexity of COVID-19 testing and suggests a simple breath test can monitor for the virus.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough scientific evidence or support to prove its validity.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that a breath test can accurately detect the presence or absence of COVID-19.
Exist alternative explanation: Experts provide alternative explanations, stating that a breath test may only indicate respiratory compromise or more serious lung diseases, but not COVID-19 specifically.
